title: Integrative Medicine & Wellness Center - Atlantic Health
description: Atlantic Health System Integrative Medicine offers outpatient healing treatments, including acupuncture, in our Chambers Center for Well Being.
cleaned_text: Atlantic Health System's state-of-the-art wellness center, Chambers Center for Well-Being, provides a comprehensive range of medical and preventive care. Services include functional medicine, fitness, nutrition, spa, well-being, and therapeutic treatments to improve overall health. The supportive environment inspires and empowers patients to adopt a proactive, holistic approach to health and wellness. Learn more about these services: [ Show List of Services Hide List
